Inc.","details":"This contract provides a simple Schelling game for pausing and updating a Tellor Layer Light Client Bridge contract in the event that Tellor Layer chain is attacked. Any user can pay a high fee to begin the Schelling game. Then either the bridge is immediately paused or an optional  second signature is required from a configured guardian address. The initiator has a period of time to propose a new implementation address. Then anyone can pay to support or oppose the proposal. Once the voting period expires, the bridge is unpaused, and if the proposal is supported by a majority of the tokens, the bridge  implementation address is updated. The winning side gets their tokens refunded and splits the losing side's tokens.","kind":"dev","methods":{"claim(uint256)":{"details":"Claim tokens after proposal has been claim(uint256).details: Claim tokens after proposal has been executed

params._proposalId: ID of proposal to claim tokens from

params._extensionPeriod: total voting period, reset when outcome changes
params._guardian: optional guardian to sign proposal to pause bridge
params._minInitAmount: minimum amount of tokens required to initiate Schelling game. 10% is burned
params._requireGuardianSignature: whether or not guardian signature is required to pause bridge
params._submissionPeriod: maximum period after pausing bridge to submit implementation

executeProposal(uint256).details: Execute proposal after voting period has expired or after submission period has expired if guardian required but never signed

returns._0: initiator address of user who initiated Schelling game
returns._1: proposedImplementation address of proposed bridge implementation
returns._2: amountFor amount of tokens in support of proposal
returns._3: amountAgainst amount of tokens against proposal
returns._4: submissionDeadline deadline for submitting implementation address
returns._5: expirationTime deadline for voting, extended when outcome changes
returns._6: executed whether or not proposal has been executed
returns._7: guardianSigned whether or not guardian has signed proposal

returns._0: amountFor amount of tokens in support of proposal
returns._1: amountAgainst amount of tokens against proposal

guardianPauseBridge(uint256).details: Guardian can sign proposal and pause bridge, only if required

initiateProposal().details: Initiates Schelling game by paying minimum amount of tokens

submitImplementation(uint256,address).details: Propose new implementation address after Schelling game initiated

throwAwayGuardianship().details: Guardian can remove requirement for signature to pause bridge

updateVote(uint256,bool).details: Allows a voter to change their vote before expiration

params._for: whether or not to vote in support of proposal

vote(uint256,bool).details: Vote in support of or against proposal

params._for: whether or not to vote in support of proposal

updateVote(uint256,bool).notice: Initiator cannot update vote, and 10% of amount is burned

documentation.text:

 @notice 10% of amount is burned

 @param _newGuardian address of new guardian
